name: cluster
description: Kubernetes cluster ID for deferred run id resolution

name: namespace
description: Kubernetes cluster ID for deferred run id resolution

name: event
description: service:start | service:end | pod:create | pod:delete | pod:state_* | acn-cr:create | acn-cr:status_* | acn-cr:delete | acn-dr:create | acn-dr:status_* | acn-dr:delete | HF:getAvailableTemplates | HF:getRequestStatus | HF:getReturnRequests | HF:requestMachines | HF:requestReturnMachines

name: container_name
description: Container name for the event in question. Can be used to infer the Symphony template.

name: node
description: VM hostname, or kubernetes node name
